text.value:
@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON t.share_id = sa.share_id
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group s ON sa.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE t.transaction_date >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''
AND t.transaction_date < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, date, financial_stat_type_code_id;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(scoring_group_id, date, value, financial_stat_type_code_id, created_date, created_by)
SELECT
    sg.scoring_group_id,
    agg.date,
    agg.total_value,
    4,
    NOW() AS created_date,
    ''system'' AS created_by
FROM
(
    SELECT sa.account_id, sfs.date, SUM(sfs.value) AS total_value
    FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat sfs
    JOIN ch_fss.share_account sa ON sa.share_id = sfs.share_id
    WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
    pipeline().parameters.start_date,
    '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
    pipeline().parameters.end_date,
    '''
    AND sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    GROUP BY sa.account_id, sfs.date
) agg
JOIN ch_fss.scoring_group sg ON sg.account_id = agg.account_id;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
(
   scoring_group_id,
   financial_stat_type_code_id,
   date,
   value
)
WITH date_series AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series(''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''::date, ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''::date - interval ''1 day'', interval ''1 day'')
),
avg_values AS (
    SELECT
        sfs.scoring_group_id,
        sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id,
        ds.dt AS date,
        SUM(sfs.value)/30 AS avg_value
    FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs 
    CROSS JOIN date_series ds
    WHERE sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
      AND sfs.date BETWEEN ds.dt - INTERVAL ''29 days'' AND ds.dt  -- last 30 days including the day
    GROUP BY sfs.scoring_group_id, sfs.financial_stat_type_code_id, ds.dt
),
mapped_avg AS (
    SELECT
        scoring_group_id,
        CASE financial_stat_type_code_id
            WHEN 1 THEN 5
            WHEN 2 THEN 6
            WHEN 3 THEN 7
            WHEN 4 THEN 8
        END AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
        date,
        avg_value
    FROM avg_values
)
SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    financial_stat_type_code_id,
    date,
    avg_value AS value
FROM mapped_avg
WHERE avg_value IS NOT NULL;'
)

@concat(
'WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  ''' 
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  9,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals;'
)

@concat(
'WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(
      CASE 
        WHEN financial_stat_type_code_id = 7 THEN abs(value)
        WHEN financial_stat_type_code_id = 8 THEN value
        ELSE 0 -- in case other codes appear
      END
    )::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
 pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (7, 8)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  10,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals;'
)

@concat(
'WITH denominators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(abs(value)) AS denom_sum
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
numerators AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS numerator
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    n.numerator,
    d.denom_sum,
    CASE 
      WHEN d.denom_sum = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE n.numerator / d.denom_sum
    END AS ratio
  FROM numerators n
  JOIN denominators d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  11,
  date,
  ratio
FROM vals;'
)

@concat(
'WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
deposits AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS income
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id = 5
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.income - n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN deposits d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  12,
  date,
  diff*30
FROM vals;'
)

@concat(
'WITH expenses AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    SUM(ABS(value)) * 30 AS total_expense
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id IN (6, 7)
  GROUP BY scoring_group_id, date
),
balances AS (
  SELECT
    scoring_group_id,
    date,
    value::numeric AS balance
  FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat sfs
  WHERE sfs."date" >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
'''
    AND sfs."date" < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
'''
    AND financial_stat_type_code_id = 8
),
vals AS (
  SELECT
    n.scoring_group_id,
    n.date,
    d.balance - n.total_expense AS diff
  FROM expenses n
  LEFT JOIN balances d
    ON n.scoring_group_id = d.scoring_group_id
    AND n.date = d.date
)
INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT 
  scoring_group_id,
  13,
  date,
  diff
FROM vals;'
)

'DELETE FROM ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat
WHERE date >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
''' 
AND date < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
''';'
)

INSERT INTO ch_fss.watermark_table (process_name, last_processed_date,created_by,created_date, updated_date, updated_by)
VALUES (
    'Transactionprocessing',
    TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('LatestProcessedEndDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1 day',
    'Admin',
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    'Admin'
);

@concat(
  'insert into ch_fss.job_run_status (pl_name, pl_runid, pl_triggertime, pl_triggertype, End_time, Start_time, status, error_message) values (',
  '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
  '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
  '''', formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), '''', ',',
  '''', pipeline().TriggerType, '''', ',',
  '''', variables('end_time'), '''', ',',
  '''', variables('start_time'), '''', ',',
  '''', activity('updatewatermark').status, '''', ',',
  if(
    equals(activity('updatewatermark').status, 'Failed'),
    concat('''', replace(activity('updatewatermark').error.message.details, '''', ''''''), ''''),
    'NULL'
  ),
  ')'
)

source.query:
SELECT
  gs.dt::date AS start_date,
  CASE
    WHEN (gs.dt::date + INTERVAL '1 month')::date > CURRENT_DATE
      THEN CURRENT_DATE
    ELSE (gs.dt::date + INTERVAL '1 month')::date
  END AS end_date
FROM (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('month', last_processed_date)::date AS start_date,
    date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date AS current_month_start
  FROM ch_fss.watermark_table
  WHERE process_name = 'TransactionProcessing'
  ORDER BY created_date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS p
CROSS JOIN LATERAL generate_series(
  p.start_date::timestamp,
  p.current_month_start::timestamp,
  INTERVAL '1 month'
) AS gs(dt)
ORDER BY start_date

scripts.text:
INSERT INTO ch_fss.watermark_table (
    process_name, last_processed_date, created_by, created_date, updated_date, updated_by
)
VALUES (
    'TransactionProcessing',
    '2024-12-01'::timestamp,
    'Admin',
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    'Admin'
);

UPDATE ch_fss."transaction" t
SET transaction_type_code_id = CASE
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 AND t.payment_method = 'F' THEN 3
    WHEN t.transaction_amount < 0 THEN 2
    WHEN t.transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1
    ELSE transaction_type_code_id  -- keep existing if none match
END;

scripts.text:
insert into ch_fss.anonymized_member(anonymized_member_id,member_id)

select member_id,member_id from ch_fss1."member"

insert into ch_fss.scoring_group (
group_type_code_id,
account_id,
created_by,
created_date,
updated_by,
updated_date)
select 
1,
ma.account_id , 
'admin',
now(), 
'admin',
now()
from ch_fss1.member_account ma
where ma.close_date is null

@concat('
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_date::date >= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.start_date,
 '''::date
  AND t.transaction_date::date <= ''',
 pipeline().parameters.end_date,
 '''::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;
')

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  WHERE t.transaction_date >= ''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  ''' 
  and t.transaction_date  < ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;'
)

@concat(
'WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series(''',
  pipeline().parameters.start_date,
  '''::date, ''',
  pipeline().parameters.end_date,
  '''::date - interval ''1 day'', interval ''1 day'')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT share_id
  FROM ch_fss.share_account sa
  WHERE sa.close_date IS NULL
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT g.share_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d
)
INSERT INTO fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal(
  share_id, 
  date
) 
SELECT ac.share_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.share_id = ac.share_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;'
)

@concat(
'INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  share_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.share_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  ''system'' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM  ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.share_id = tm.share_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true
AND prev.value IS NOT null;'
)

@concat(
'delete from ch_fss.share_financial_stat
WHERE date >= ''',
pipeline().parameters.start_date,
''' 
AND date < ''',
pipeline().parameters.end_date,
''';'
)

scriptLines:
postSQLs:['INSERT INTO ch_fss.anonymized_member (anonymized_member_id, member_id)
SELECT account_id, account_id
FROM ch_fss.member_account
WHERE account_id IS NOT NULL;'],
locate(' - ', Comments) - (locate('Added by: ', Comments) + length('Added by: '))
locate('***', Comments, locate('***', Comments) + 1) - (locate('On: ', Comments) + length('On: '))
story_date = toString(toTimestamp(story_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> COLUMNSDERIVED2
